courses.name: Course 1: 5 Day Beginners Course
courses.content: This course covers the basics of the subject, including foundational knowledge and skills to help beginners get started. The course is divided into 5 easy-to-follow sections, each with its own learning objectives and exercises.

courses.name: Course 2: Intermediate Mastery
courses.content: Building on beginner concepts, this course introduces more advanced techniques and strategies. It is designed for learners who already have a basic understanding and are looking to further develop their skills.

courses.name: Course 3: Expert Level Masterclass
courses.content: A comprehensive course aimed at professionals or advanced learners. This masterclass dives deep into complex concepts, offering hands-on projects, case studies, and expert-level insights.
